message.body: $AAPL Such a corrupt market. It’s all controlled by the big boys. This is all intentional and they don’t care if we lose our money and life savings.  It’s all fun to them when they shake out the retailers and trigger stop losses. I know the game and have sued Dean Whitter in the past and took it to trial on Wall Street and won! Im still in and moving money to buy more. We will get our green back soon.  The sad thing is they will ride it back up with us and make the profits again. It’s all a high stakes game of gambling.  My wife is in a mutual fund with Apple in it . She has her life saving in the fund controlled by her advisor.  She down 10k today because of this. Can’t wait until next Thursday for earning.  Sorry for the long post. I’m pissed like all of you bulls.
